intro.description: The main goal of this task is to define and establish customer relationships. Sales channels and customer relationships vary depending on the customer segment the service is targeted to.

item.title: Analyse expected relationships from each customer segment
item.description: Each market segment expects a different type of relationship with you, the software provider. Analyse which are the expected mechanisms that your customers expect to relate to you.

item.title: Perform a gap analysis on what the customer expects vs what you can offer
item.description: The previous activity identified the potential relationship types that each customer segment may expect from the service provider. However, some of these relationships may be up and running in the company. An evaluation of what the company has and what it is missing is performed for such a relationship types is performed in this activity. The goal is to know what can remain as it is, what needs to be readapted, and what needs to be defined from scratch.

item.title: Implement generic customer relationship mechanisms
item.description: Both old and new relationships with the customer must be integrated in the new business model and in the update definition of organizational processes of the company.

item.title: Instantiate these generic mechanisms to the corresponding customer segment
item.description: Starting with the generic custtomer relationship mechanism, instanitate this into what each customer segment may expect.

item.title: Determine sales channels
item.description:
These customer relationship involves also the determination of the sales channels.
The question that needs to be answered is: How will the customers contract the service?
Thus, depending on the type of service and the customer segment, the channels may differ. For instance, a different telephone number for different media support (one for the radio, another for TV, another for the internet). The channels can include the software provider’s website, telephone, commercial network, etc.

item.title: Implement sales channels
item.description: This activity entails the practical implementation of the sales channels per customer segment as defined in the previous task
